feed.title: Activepieces Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.63.0
entry.content:
IMPORTANT

  • If you are using the embedding SDK connect method, please upgrade to 0.63.1 and beyond

‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: publish everything to git (#8029) @hazemadelkhalel

üß© Pieces

  • feat: skyvern piece (#8037) @rimjhimyadav
  • fix: update minimum supported release for ai pieces (#8036) @amrdb
  • feat(google-drive): duplicate file as a specific mime type (gdocs or gsheet) (#7970) @geekyme
  • feat: Airparser piece (#7935) @krushnarout
  • feat: Chatbase piece (#7924) @krushnarout
  • feat: serpapi piece (#7916) @AnkitSharmaOnGithub
  • feat: Mem Piece (#7930) @krushnarout
  • feat: clockify piece (#8009) @rimjhimyadav
  • feat(piece-ticktick): implement ticktick piece with actions and triggers (#7866) @onyedikachi-david
  • feat: zoho mail piece (#7650) @onyedikachi-david
  • fix(google-sheets): fix rows length greater than headers count scenario (#7995) @kishanprmr
  • feat(docusign): remove extra 'api/' from consent URL (#7990) @AdamSelene
  • fix(pipedrive): Replace polling triggers with webhook triggers (#7971) @danielpoonwj
  • feat: tarvent piece - update contributors (#7980) @DerekJDev

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: bump version of @activepieces/pieces-common to 0.5.0 (#8045) @amrdb
  • fix: bump versions for AI pieces (#8044) @amrdb
  • fix: bump OpenAI package version to 0.5.1 (#8041) @amrdb
  • fix: bump shared version (#8040) @amrdb
  • fix: display error notification (#7918) @obenazouz-wedof
  • fix: update pieces to new AI SDK (#8031) @amrdb
  • fix: avatar pictures (#8013) @abuaboud

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • fix: apply validate-publishable-packages to all packages (#8043) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: rate limit jobs should have ultra low priority (#8033) @abuaboud
  • refactor: handle undefined by using Map instead of Record in flow change check (#8023) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: prevent dialog overflow on small screens in MCP Add Tool modal ( Issue #8002) (#8003) @jadhavharshh

üìö Documentation

  • docs: improve predefined connections (#8008) @abuaboud
  • docs: ai proivders (#8019) @amrdb
  • refactor: alerts + connections queries/mutations + add frontend best practices docs (#7912) @Louai-Zokerburg
  • docs: add jadhavharshh as a contributor for code (#8004) @allcontributors

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • refactor: revamp ai provider (#7908) @amrdb
  • refactor: alerts + connections queries/mutations + add frontend best practices docs (#7912) @Louai-Zokerburg

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AdamSelene, @AnkitSharmaOnGithub, @DerekJDev, @Louai-Zokerburg, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @amrdb, @danielpoonwj, @geekyme, @hazemadelkhalel, @jadhavharshh, @kishanprmr, @krushnarout, @obenazouz-wedof, @onyedikachi-david and @rimjhimyadav

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.63.1
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: embedding (connect) method wasn't working (#8088) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.64.1 (Skip to 0.64.2)
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: support streaming in openai provider using responses api for agents (#8132) @amrdb
  • feat: introduce google gemini AI provider (#8112) @amrdb

üß© Pieces

  • feat: introduce retry on failure mode (#8148) @abuaboud
  • feat(google-sheets): add export sheet action (#8139) @geekyme
  • feat(slack): add more scopes to slack (#8140) @Jeremie-Preault
  • feat(kallabot-ai): call events webhook trigger (#8082) @abdulrahmanmajid
  • feat(talkable): Add action claimOffer and refactoring (#8101) @Vitalini
  • feat: Circle.so piece (#7873) @onyedikachi-david
  • feat: acuity scheduling piece (#7797) @onyedikachi-david
  • feat: Crisp Piece (#7926) @Ani-4x
  • feat: Deepgram Piece (#7934) @Ani-4x
  • feat: Adding Attio Piece (#7669) @AnkitSharmaOnGithub
  • fix(fb-leads): Add Missing Page Scope and Enhance Lead Payload (#8106) @kishanprmr
  • feat(reddit): add Reddit piece for CRUD operations on posts and comments (#7994) @bhaviksingla1403
  • feat(github): new discussion and discussion comment triggers (#8093) @kishanprmr

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: Move Platform Plan Migration to enterprise only for 0.64.0 (#8163) @huzky-v
  • fix: correct token expiration time unit in managed authentication (#8159) @cjwooo
  • feat: remove project ids from connections (#8149) @abuaboud
  • fix: revert include_usage in openai stream (#8134) @amrdb
  • fix: agents and openai proxy streaming (#8133) @amrdb
  • fix: refresh oauth2 client credentials connections with correct scopes (#8054) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix(mcp): mcp with connectionless pieces (#8104) @amrdb
  • fix: filter pieces on embedding (#8091) @abuaboud
  • fix: avoid key validation & verify runs (#8090) @abuaboud
  • fix: remove unique constraint on issue (#8087) @abuaboud
  • feat: revamp colors & style activepieces (#8162) @abuaboud

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • refactor: step hooks & introduce escalation mode in agents (#8131) @abuaboud
  • feat: polish agents & output in the builder (#8130) @abuaboud
  • fix(rbac): enable none for tables & todos (#8123) @abuaboud
  • fix: enhance agent card / regenerate issues / listing flow versions (#8116) @abuaboud
  • feat: improve agent output (#8115) @abuaboud
  • feat: animate runs (#8114) @abuaboud
  • feat: introduce agents todos (#8113) @abuaboud
  • feat: rename beta to new (#8092) @abuaboud

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add cjwooo as a contributor for code (#8160) @allcontributors
  • docs: add BenjaminAlan as a contributor for code (#8096) @allcontributors

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • feat: introduce AI usage (#8046) @amrdb
  • bug: save handshake configuration before calling onEnable (#8157) @abuaboud
  • feat: upgrade to fastify v5 (#8128) @abuaboud
  • refactor: security upgrade fastify from 4.28.1 to 4.29.1 (#8127) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: move save sample endpoint to update flow (#8125) @abuaboud
  • fix: Security upgrade fastify from 4.28.1 to 4.29.1 (#8121) @hazemadelkhalel
  • refactor: set status from publish button (#8119) @abuaboud
  • fix: remove depercated code of ai button & tooltips for bar (#8105) @abuaboud
  • chore: add language switcher under dark mode in user settings dropdown + hide appearance settings in embedding (#8100) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix(dialog): fix overflow issue in New Flow dialog on MCP page (#8095) @jadhavharshh

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @Ani-4x, @AnkitSharmaOnGithub, @Jeremie-Preault, @Vitalini, @abdulrahmanmajid, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @amrdb, @bhaviksingla1403, @cjwooo, @geekyme, @hazemadelkhalel, @jadhavharshh, @kishanprmr, @onyedikachi-david and @snyk-bot

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.64.2
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: upgrade bullmq compatibility with fastify 5 (#8166) @abuaboud
  • fix: enhance error messages for testing steps (#8155) @hazemadelkhalel

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud and @hazemadelkhalel

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.65.0
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: refactor trial (#8223) @Louai-Zokerburg
  • feat: one big change (#8198) @abuaboud
  • feat: revamp agents to v2 (#8201) @abuaboud
  • chore: revamp piece selector (#8191) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • refactor: new chat trigger (#8196) @abuaboud

üß© Pieces

  • fix(notion): add error message for missing notion field type (#8324) @kishanprmr
  • feat: wufoo piece (#8290) @krushnarout
  • fix(dimo): fix vehicle token generation function and telemetry API props (#8321) @yusuf-cirak
  • feat(microsoft-power-bi): create dataset and push rows to table actions (#8086) @calladodan
  • feat(metabase): embedding question action (#8307) @Kevinyu-alan
  • feat: scrapeless piece (#8178) @sunorains
  • feat: airtop piece (#8214) @aryel780
  • feat: notion piece bounty (#8217) @ezhil56x
  • feat(flow-helper): fail flow action (#7851) @AnkitSharmaOnGithub
  • feat: Fillout forms piece (#8240) @Sanket6652
  • fix(elevenlabs): update library and support API regions (#8238) @marapper
  • feat(pieces): pieces-dimo integration (#8064) @yusuf-cirak
  • fix(s3): update trigger strategy to time based for duplicate file issue (#8255) @kishanprmr
  • feat(xero): add attachments/settings scope (#8256) @kishanprmr
  • feat(metabase): improve get graph (#8239) @Kevinyu-alan
  • feat: Cognito Forms Piece (#7863) @krushnarout
  • feat(dust): bump SDK version to fix API error (#8202) @AdamSelene
  • feat(wedof): adding tag piece (#8052) @obenazouz-wedof

üõ†Ô∏è Piece Framework

  • feat: added datetime to array (#8258) @Akira013

üêû Bug Fixes

  • patch logical error for postgres password wrong (#8298) @teochenglim
  • fix: request trial button + text color on role dialog (#8316) @Louai-Zokerburg
  • fix: make draft flow version show correct piece action/trigger props for latest patched version (#8268) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: return json instead of raw for older universal ai pieces (#8305) @amrdb
  • fix: step is not defined in the issue (#8297) @abuaboud
  • fix: inline items in sandbox code only (#8296) @abuaboud
  • feat(executors): add duration tracking for action execution steps (#8293) @abuaboud
  • fix: show loading to step that actually running (#8292) @abuaboud
  • fix: make the inital title and icon for the app load from env variables (#8274) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: http proxy wasn't sending body or headers correctly (#8267) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix(ai-providers): gemini 2.5 pro pricing model (#8233) @amrdb
  • fix: user can't dismiss changelog announcement to themselves (#8263) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: improve MCP parameter extraction prompt (#8253) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: stripe webhook for payg and enterprise (#8252) @Louai-Zokerburg
  • feat: optmize code builds (#8245) @abuaboud
  • fix: saving button for branding in platform settings was always disabled (#8244) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: agent error handling (#8224) @amrdb
  • fix: openai streaming always include usage (#8220) @amrdb
  • fix: ai credits redis increment floats (#8210) @amrdb
  • fix(hot): skip platformPlan info fetch in project dashboard (#8208) @Louai-Zokerburg
  • fix: agent execution message and output (#8207) @amrdb
  • fix(hot): make billing cycle dates nullable (#8204) @Louai-Zokerburg

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • chore: implement integration tests for AI providers (#8271) @amrdb
  • feat(executors): add duration tracking for action execution steps (#8293) @abuaboud
  • chore: add top 110 used pieces translations (#8270) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat: upgrade agent helper to use gpt-4o instead of gpt-4o-mini (#8262) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: add inputs and code mirror json viewer to agent tool block (#8246) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: resolve dynamic properties in MCP tools (#8227) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: resolve dynamic properties in MCP tools (#8195) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: list users endpoint by external id (#8200) @abuaboud
  • feat: implement agent selector (#8199) @abuaboud
  • feat(docker): optimize build cache by reordering COPY and npm ci (#8193) @hazemadelkhalel

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add calladodan as a contributor for plugin (#8314) @allcontributors
  • docs: add sunorains as a contributor for plugin (#8313) @allcontributors
  • docs: add ezhil56x as a contributor for plugin (#8306) @allcontributors
  • docs: add yusuf-cirak as a contributor for plugin (#8266) @allcontributors
  • docs: add marapper as a contributor for plugin (#8248) @allcontributors

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • refactor: add more flags (#8308) @abuaboud
  • chore(deps): bump koa and @nx/react (#8309) @dependabot
  • refactor: clean up run status (#8265) @abuaboud
  • refactor: ai credits (#8230) @abuaboud
  • refactor: ai credits overage (#8228) @Louai-Zokerburg
  • feat: translations (#8184) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AdamSelene, @Akira013, @AnkitSharmaOnGithub, @Kevinyu-alan, @Louai-Zokerburg, @Sanket6652, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @amrdb, @aryel780, @calladodan, @dependabot, @dependabot[bot], @ezhil56x, @hazemadelkhalel, @joshuaheslin, @kishanprmr, @krushnarout, @marapper, @obenazouz-wedof, @onyedikachi-david, @sunorains, @teochenglim and @yusuf-cirak
